main event: On August 29, 1961, a round white object, the size of a jet, was observed over Osan, Korea, and reported by military personnel.
interesting points: The object was confirmed on ground radar but could not be tracked properly., Witnesses reported seeing the object change color from white to reddish., The object exhibited irregular movements and high speed that exceeded known aircraft capabilities., The sighting lasted for approximately 1.5 minutes., Multiple military agents saw the object under similar conditions and agreed on the details of the sighting.
